text: Kim Kardashian West. Dimitrios Kambouris / Getty Images Last week, Kim Kardashian West was accused of cultural appropriation over her Aaliyah Haughton Halloween costume, which was meant to resemble the late singer's outfit from her ` ` Try Again'' music video. On November 3, the reality TV star apologized for the costume on her website â€” but now people are taking issue with her response. ` ` I saw online that some people thought my costume was in poor taste and I am truly sorry if that offended anyone, but I wasn't dressing up as a race or culture but rather as a woman whom I admire,'' she wrote.
